name: Orbital Space
description:
Beat waves of enemys to save the galaxy.

I can't guarantee that the Linux and Mac builds work.

Left mouse button to move
Right mouse button to shoot
Space to use hyperdrive
F to deploy Ion Bomb

Credits:

Planets:
Planet Generator by Deep-Fold: https://deep-fold.itch.io/pixel-planet-generator

Ships:
Spaceship Generator by Deep-Fold: https://deep-fold.itch.io/spaceship-generator 
Simple Space by Kenney: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/simple-space

Sounds:
Free Soundly Library: https://getsoundly.com/
"Laser 1.flac" by sound_designer_from_Turkey of Freesound.org

Music:
Ludum Dare 38 - Track 3 by Tallbeard Studios: https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle
Ludum Dare 38 - Track 4 by Tallbeard Studios: https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle
